unwound.title: Avista Corp. CU Chooses ESP | ESP, Inc.
unwound.description: Spokane Valley, WA – June 17, 2020 – When Avista Corp. Credit Union sought a new core processor they ended up finding the perfect fit in their own backyard. Avista Corp. Credit Union has been around since 1934 and serves the regular employees, retirees, and family members of the regional energy provider Avista Corporation and its subsidiaries.
